roleset.name: remove one's manly bits (animal or metaphorical extension)

example.name: metaphorical usage
example.text: At my school the student government theoretically can veto things set by the staff , but it has been all but neutered [*] by the new administration who did n't give a gently caress .
example.arg: the new administration who did n't give a gently caress

example.name: All args
example.text: One odd thing about Charlie is that he's only half-neutered b/c he had only one testicle that had descended so the vet only neutered him of the one testicle.

roleset.note: NEUTER-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. Close to VNcls cheat-10.6. (from neuter.01-v)
